bibl.title: The Henet of Moeris and the Ancient Administrative Division of the Fayum in two Parts.
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - Part I: The Henet of Moeris: 1. Henet, a canal?; - 2. Henet, which canal?; - 3. The Henet of Moeris in the Greek evidence. - Part II: Moeris or Moiris: 4. The Fayum lake or lake of Moiris; - 5. Moeris, the 'Great canal'; - 6. Moeris, the town.
VANDORPE Katelijn, The Henet of Moeris and the Ancient Administrative Division of the Fayum in two Parts.
